resources.string: Run this app with TalkBack enabled on your device. If your device has its primary language set to a language that has a Latin script (e.g. English or French), you will notice that TalkBack does not read out the Arabic text. On the other hand, if your device has its primary language set to a language that has an Arabic script (e.g. Arabic or Urdu), you will notice that TalkBack reads out both the Arabic and the English text.
